EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Salesforce
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1.Easy desktop access
Complete the full log in process from your desktop for your first log in To access Salesforce thereafter, add the link to Favourites/Bookmarks by right clicking on the following; SSO Bookmark , copy the hyperlink and save as Favourites/Bookmarks Alternatively, log in from https://barclaysafrica.my.salesforce.com/
Refer to the attachment to view the single sign-on button
2.Support available
For log in queries - Email queries to Salesforce Support - Barclays Africa; xraSalesforceSuppor1@barclayscapital.com For other queries - Comment and post queries to the Salesforce Help and Support group on Chatter
3.Mobile Ready
Refer to the attachment to download the Salesforce1 App
4. Please Note:
Pipeline management is available in all countries. Contacts and Call reports Management are not yet available in Egypt, Uganda, Tanzania, Seychelles, Mauritius, Mozambique, Zimbabwe and Botswana.
Colin Iles Head of Client Strategy
